name: beadsx
description: VSCode panel for viewing beads issue tracking state

beadsx.autoReloadInterval.description: Interval in seconds to automatically reload issues (0 to disable, max 3600 = 1 hour)

beadsx.commandPath.description: Path to the bd command (leave empty to use PATH)

beadsx.autoExpandOpen.description: Automatically expand open/in-progress issues to show children

beadsx.shortIds.description: Show shortened issue IDs without prefix (e.g., '123' instead of 'beadsx-123')

beadsx.recentWindowMinutes.description: Time window in minutes for 'Recent Issues' filter to include closed issues (default: 60 = 1 hour)

beadsx.useJsonlMode.description: Use JSONL-only mode (--no-db flag). Prevents bd from auto-discovering databases in parent directories.

scripts.publish:vsce: echo 'Requires VSCE_PAT env var' && vsce publish
scripts.publish:ovsx: echo 'Requires OVSX_TOKEN env var' && ovsx publish
scripts.install-ext: rm -f beadsx-*.vsix && vsce package --no-dependencies --allow-missing-repository && code --install-extension beadsx-*.vsix --force
scripts.cli:install: pnpm run cli:build && cp dist/bdx /usr/local/bin/bdx && codesign --force --sign - /usr/local/bin/bdx && echo 'Installed bdx to /usr/local/bin/bdx'
scripts.cli:build:all: mkdir -p dist && bun build --compile src/cli/index.tsx --outfile dist/bdx-darwin-arm64 --target bun-darwin-arm64 && bun build --compile src/cli/index.tsx --outfile dist/bdx-darwin-x64 --target bun-darwin-x64 && bun build --compile src/cli/index.tsx --outfile dist/bdx-linux-x64 --target bun-linux-x64 && bun build --compile src/cli/index.tsx --outfile dist/bdx-linux-arm64 --target bun-linux-arm64 && bun build --compile src/cli/index.tsx --outfile dist/bdx-windows-x64.exe --target bun-windows-x64
